components.name: Hero
components.description: Full-width hero section with animated title, description, optional badge, primary/secondary CTAs, and a responsive device mockup image. Uses a top glow effect for visual emphasis.

props.name: title
props.description: Main headline text displayed as an h1.

props.name: description
props.description: Supporting paragraph text below the title.

props.name: primaryCta
props.description: Primary call-to-action button with label and link.

props.name: secondaryCta
props.description: Secondary call-to-action button rendered with the glow variant.

props.name: badge
props.description: Small badge text displayed above the title.

props.name: image
props.description: Hero image displayed inside a responsive device mockup. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: children
props.description: Optional additional content rendered below the CTA buttons.

components.example:
<Hero
  title="Build your SaaS faster"
  description="Ship production-ready landing pages in minutes."
  badge="New Release"
  primaryCta={{ label: "Get Started", href: "/signup" }}
  secondaryCta={{ label: "Learn More", href: "/docs" }}
  image="/images/hero-screenshot.png"
/>

components.name: Feature
components.description: Individual feature card with an optional icon, title, and description. Used as a child of the Features grid component.

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon element displayed in a rounded container above the title.

props.name: title
props.description: Feature heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Short description of the feature.

components.example: <Feature title="Fast" description="Blazing fast performance out of the box." />

components.name: Features
components.description: Section that displays a grid of Feature cards with an optional section title and description. Supports 2, 3, or 4 column layouts.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the grid.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of grid columns. Defaults to 3.

props.name: children
props.description: Feature child components to render in the grid.

components.example:
<Features title="Why choose us" columns={3}>
  <Feature title="Fast" description="Blazing fast performance." />
  <Feature title="Secure" description="Enterprise-grade security." />
  <Feature title="Scalable" description="Grows with your business." />
</Features>

components.name: AlternatingFeatureItem
components.description: Individual bullet-point item within an AlternatingFeatureRow. Displays an optional icon, title, and description.

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon or emoji displayed to the left of the title.

props.name: title
props.description: Item heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Short item description.

components.example: <AlternatingFeatureItem icon="âš¡" title="Lightning fast" description="Sub-second load times." />

components.name: AlternatingFeatureRow
components.description: A two-column row with text content on one side and a responsive mockup image on the other. Even rows automatically flip the layout. Supports light/dark mode images.

props.name: title
props.description: Row heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Row description paragraph.

props.name: image
props.description: Feature image. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: imageAlt
props.description: Alt text for the image. Defaults to the title.

props.name: children
props.description: AlternatingFeatureItem children rendered below the description.

components.example:
<AlternatingFeatureRow
  title="Dashboard"
  description="Manage everything from one place."
  image="/images/dashboard.png"
>
  <AlternatingFeatureItem icon="ðŸ“Š" title="Analytics" description="Real-time insights." />
</AlternatingFeatureRow>

components.name: AlternatingFeatures
components.description: Container section for alternating feature rows. Renders rows with alternating text/image layout separated by dividers.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the rows.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: AlternatingFeatureRow children.

components.example:
<AlternatingFeatures title="Features">
  <AlternatingFeatureRow title="Feature 1" image="/images/f1.png" />
  <AlternatingFeatureRow title="Feature 2" image="/images/f2.png" />
</AlternatingFeatures>

components.name: PricingPlan
components.description: Data-only component that defines a single pricing plan. Must be used as a child of PricingSection. Renders nothing on its own; its props are consumed by the parent.

props.name: name
props.description: Plan name (e.g. 'Free', 'Pro', 'Enterprise').

props.name: price
props.description: Monthly price display string (e.g. '$0', '$29/mo').

props.name: yearlyPrice
props.description: Yearly price display string. Enables the monthly/yearly toggle when at least one plan has this.

props.name: description
props.description: Short plan description.

props.name: features
props.description: List of feature strings displayed as a checklist.

props.name: cta
props.description: Call-to-action button for the plan.

props.name: popular
props.description: Highlights the plan with a 'Most Popular' badge and ring styling.

components.example:
<PricingPlan
  name="Pro"
  price="$29/mo"
  yearlyPrice="$24/mo"
  description="For growing teams"
  features={["Unlimited projects", "Priority support", "Custom domains"]}
  cta={{ label: "Get Started", href: "/signup" }}
  popular
/>

components.name: ComparisonRow
components.description: Data-only component that defines a row in the pricing comparison table. Must be used as a child of PricingSection.

props.name: feature
props.description: Feature name displayed in the first column.

props.name: values
props.description: Array of values per plan. Booleans render as check/dash icons; strings render as text.

components.example: <ComparisonRow feature="Custom domains" values={[false, true, true]} />

components.name: ComparisonCategory
components.description: Data-only component that adds a category header row in the pricing comparison table. Must be used as a child of PricingSection.

props.name: title
props.description: Category heading text.

components.example: <ComparisonCategory title="Core Features" />

components.name: PricingSection
components.description: Full pricing section with plan cards, optional monthly/yearly toggle, and an optional feature comparison table. Consumes PricingPlan, ComparisonRow, and ComparisonCategory children.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: monthlyLabel
props.description: Label for the monthly toggle. Defaults to 'Monthly'.

props.name: yearlyLabel
props.description: Label for the yearly toggle. Defaults to 'Yearly'.

props.name: mostPopularLabel
props.description: Label for the popular plan badge. Defaults to 'Most Popular'.

props.name: children
props.description: PricingPlan, ComparisonCategory, and ComparisonRow children.

components.example:
<PricingSection title="Pricing" description="Choose your plan">
  <PricingPlan name="Free" price="$0" features={["1 project"]} cta={{ label: "Start Free", href: "/signup" }} />
  <PricingPlan name="Pro" price="$29/mo" features={["Unlimited projects"]} cta={{ label: "Go Pro", href: "/signup" }} popular />
</PricingSection>

components.name: Companies
components.description: Logo showcase section with two variants: a continuous marquee scroll animation or a static inline flex layout. Supports logo names, versions, and badges in inline mode.

props.name: title
props.description: Title text above the logos.

props.name: logos
props.type: Array<{ src: ImageSource; alt: string; width?: number; name?: string; version?: string; badge?: string }>
props.description: Array of logo items. Each has an image src (string or { light, dark }), alt text, and optional width, name, version, and badge.

props.name: variant
props.description: Display variant. 'marquee' (default) shows a scrolling animation; 'inline' shows a static flexbox layout with names and badges.

components.example:
<Companies
  title="Trusted by leading companies"
  logos={[
    { src: "/logos/acme.svg", alt: "Acme" },
    { src: "/logos/globex.svg", alt: "Globex" }
  ]}
/>

components.name: Testimonial
components.description: Single large testimonial quote block with author info, displayed in a centered glass card.

props.name: quote
props.description: The testimonial quote text.

props.name: author
props.description: Name of the person giving the testimonial.

props.name: role
props.description: Job title or role of the author.

props.name: image
props.description: Author's avatar image. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: company
props.description: Company name of the author.

components.example:
<Testimonial
  quote="This product changed how we work."
  author="Jane Doe"
  role="CEO"
  company="Acme Inc"
  image="/images/jane.jpg"
/>

components.name: TestimonialCard
components.description: Compact testimonial card with optional star rating. Used as a child of the Testimonials grid component.

props.name: quote
props.description: The testimonial quote text.

props.name: author
props.description: Name of the person giving the testimonial.

props.name: role
props.description: Job title or role of the author.

props.name: company
props.description: Company name of the author.

props.name: image
props.description: Author's avatar image. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: rating
props.description: Star rating (1-5) displayed as filled star icons.

components.example:
<TestimonialCard
  quote="Incredible experience!"
  author="John Smith"
  role="CTO"
  company="Globex"
  rating={5}
/>

components.name: Testimonials
components.description: Grid section that displays multiple TestimonialCard components with an optional section title and description.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the grid.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of grid columns. Defaults to 3.

props.name: children
props.description: TestimonialCard children.

components.example:
<Testimonials title="What our customers say" columns={3}>
  <TestimonialCard quote="Amazing!" author="Alice" rating={5} />
  <TestimonialCard quote="Love it!" author="Bob" rating={5} />
  <TestimonialCard quote="Great tool." author="Charlie" rating={4} />
</Testimonials>

components.name: BannerCTA
components.description: Full-width call-to-action banner with a centered glow effect, title, optional subtext, and a primary button. Supports additional children content.

props.name: title
props.description: Banner headline text.

props.name: buttonText
props.description: Text displayed on the CTA button.

props.name: buttonHref
props.description: URL the button links to.

props.name: subtext
props.description: Supporting text displayed below the title and above the button.

props.name: children
props.description: Additional content rendered below the button.

components.example:
<BannerCTA
  title="Ready to get started?"
  buttonText="Start Free Trial"
  buttonHref="/signup"
  subtext="No credit card required."
/>

components.name: BannerFeature
components.description: Small inline feature item with an optional icon, designed to be placed inside a BannerCTA as a child.

props.name: title
props.description: Feature text.

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon or emoji displayed before the title.

components.example: <BannerFeature title="99.9% uptime" icon="âœ…" />

components.name: FAQItem
components.description: Individual FAQ accordion item with a question trigger and expandable answer content. Used as a child of FAQ.

props.name: question
props.description: The question text displayed as the accordion trigger.

props.name: children
props.description: The answer content revealed when the item is expanded.

components.example:
<FAQItem question="How does billing work?">
  We bill monthly based on your plan. You can cancel anytime.
</FAQItem>

components.name: FAQ
components.description: FAQ section with a collapsible accordion. Contains FAQItem children with question/answer pairs.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the accordion.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: FAQItem children.

components.example:
<FAQ title="Frequently Asked Questions">
  <FAQItem question="Is there a free plan?">Yes, we offer a generous free tier.</FAQItem>
  <FAQItem question="Can I cancel anytime?">Absolutely, no lock-in.</FAQItem>
</FAQ>

components.name: Step
components.description: Data-only component that defines a single step. Must be used as a child of Steps. Renders nothing on its own; its props are consumed by the parent.

props.name: title
props.description: Step heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Step description text.

components.example: <Step title="Sign up" description="Create your free account in seconds." />

components.name: Steps
components.description: Numbered step-by-step section with connected timeline indicators. Consumes Step children to display a vertical progression.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the steps.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: Step children.

components.example:
<Steps title="How it works">
  <Step title="Sign up" description="Create your account." />
  <Step title="Configure" description="Set up your workspace." />
  <Step title="Launch" description="Go live in minutes." />
</Steps>

components.name: CardGridItem
components.description: Individual card in a grid layout with an optional icon, title, description, and link. Used as a child of CardGrid.

props.name: title
props.description: Card heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Card description text.

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon element displayed above the title.

props.name: href
props.description: Optional link URL. When provided, the card becomes a clickable anchor.

components.example: <CardGridItem title="Documentation" description="Read the full docs." href="/docs" />

components.name: CardGrid
components.description: Responsive grid container for CardGridItem children. Supports 2, 3, or 4 column layouts.

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of grid columns. Defaults to 3.

props.name: children
props.description: CardGridItem children.

components.example:
<CardGrid columns={3}>
  <CardGridItem title="Feature A" description="Description A" />
  <CardGridItem title="Feature B" description="Description B" />
  <CardGridItem title="Feature C" description="Description C" />
</CardGrid>

components.name: CalloutCard
components.description: Highlighted callout box with a colored border for info, success, or warning messages. Useful for drawing attention to important content within a page.

props.name: title
props.description: Callout heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Callout body text.

props.name: variant
props.description: Color variant for the callout. Defaults to 'info'.

props.name: children
props.description: Additional content rendered below the description.

components.example:
<CalloutCard
  title="Pro Tip"
  description="You can customize the theme in settings."
  variant="info"
/>

components.name: Stat
components.description: Data-only component that defines a single statistic. Must be used as a child of Stats. Renders nothing on its own; its props are consumed by the parent.

props.name: value
props.description: The main numeric or text value displayed prominently.

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the value.

props.name: suffix
props.description: Suffix text displayed after the value (e.g. '+', '%').

props.name: description
props.description: Description text displayed below the value.

components.example: <Stat value="99.9" suffix="%" label="Uptime" description="Average over the last 12 months" />

components.name: Stats
components.description: Section displaying key statistics in a 2x2 or 4-column grid with large gradient numbers. Consumes Stat children.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the stats.

props.name: children
props.description: Stat children.

components.example:
<Stats title="Our numbers">
  <Stat value="10K" suffix="+" label="Users" />
  <Stat value="99.9" suffix="%" label="Uptime" />
  <Stat value="50" suffix="+" label="Countries" />
  <Stat value="24/7" label="Support" />
</Stats>

components.name: BentoItem
components.description: Individual bento grid card with a title, optional description, optional full-bleed image, and support for custom children. Supports spanning 1 or 2 columns.

props.name: title
props.description: Card heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Card description text.

props.name: image
props.description: Full-bleed image at the bottom of the card. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: span
props.description: Number of grid columns the item spans. Defaults to 1.

props.name: children
props.description: Custom content rendered inside the card.

components.example: <BentoItem title="Analytics" description="Track everything in real-time." image="/images/analytics.png" span={2} />

components.name: BentoGrid
components.description: Asymmetric grid layout section for showcasing features in a bento-box style. Uses a 3-column grid with equal-height rows. Contains BentoItem children.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the grid.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: BentoItem children.

components.example:
<BentoGrid title="Everything you need">
  <BentoItem title="Dashboard" description="Overview at a glance." span={2} />
  <BentoItem title="Reports" description="Detailed insights." />
  <BentoItem title="Team" description="Collaborate seamlessly." />
  <BentoItem title="Integrations" description="Connect your tools." span={2} />
</BentoGrid>

components.name: GalleryItem
components.description: Individual gallery image card with a hover zoom effect and an optional caption. Used as a child of Gallery.

props.name: src
props.description: Image source. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: alt
props.description: Alt text for the image.

props.name: caption
props.description: Caption text displayed below the image.

components.example: <GalleryItem src="/images/screenshot-1.png" alt="Dashboard view" caption="The main dashboard" />

components.name: Gallery
components.description: Responsive image gallery section with optional title and description. Displays GalleryItem children in a configurable grid.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the gallery.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of grid columns. Defaults to 3.

props.name: children
props.description: GalleryItem children.

components.example:
<Gallery title="Screenshots" columns={3}>
  <GalleryItem src="/images/s1.png" alt="Screenshot 1" />
  <GalleryItem src="/images/s2.png" alt="Screenshot 2" />
  <GalleryItem src="/images/s3.png" alt="Screenshot 3" />
</Gallery>

components.name: SocialProof
components.description: Compact social proof section showing stacked user avatars with a text message and optional subtext. Ideal for displaying user counts or trust indicators.

props.name: avatars
props.description: Array of avatar image URLs displayed as overlapping circles.

props.name: text
props.description: Main social proof text (e.g. 'Loved by 10,000+ users').

props.name: subtext
props.description: Secondary text displayed below the main text.

components.example:
<SocialProof
  avatars={["/avatars/1.jpg", "/avatars/2.jpg", "/avatars/3.jpg"]}
  text="Loved by 10,000+ teams"
  subtext="across 50 countries"
/>

components.name: CarouselItem
components.description: Individual card within a horizontally scrollable Carousel. Supports an image, title, description, and custom children.

props.name: title
props.description: Card heading text.

props.name: description
props.description: Card description text.

props.name: image
props.description: Card image displayed above the content. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: children
props.description: Custom content rendered inside the card.

components.example: <CarouselItem title="Feature 1" description="Description of feature 1." image="/images/f1.png" />

components.name: Carousel
components.description: Horizontally scrollable carousel section with snap-scrolling, left/right navigation buttons, and optional title/description. Contains CarouselItem children.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the carousel.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: CarouselItem children.

components.example:
<Carousel title="Explore our features">
  <CarouselItem title="Feature 1" description="Description 1" image="/images/f1.png" />
  <CarouselItem title="Feature 2" description="Description 2" image="/images/f2.png" />
  <CarouselItem title="Feature 3" description="Description 3" image="/images/f3.png" />
</Carousel>

components.name: TabItem
components.description: Data-only component that defines a single tab. Must be used as a child of TabsSection. Renders nothing on its own; its props are consumed by the parent.

props.name: label
props.description: Tab button label text.

props.name: title
props.description: Content heading displayed when the tab is active.

props.name: description
props.description: Content description displayed when the tab is active.

props.name: image
props.description: Image displayed alongside the content when the tab is active. Pass a string URL or { light, dark } for theme-aware images.

props.name: children
props.description: Custom content rendered when the tab is active.

components.example: <TabItem label="Overview" title="Product Overview" description="Everything you need to know." image="/images/overview.png" />

components.name: TabsSection
components.description: Interactive tabbed section with pill-style tab buttons and a content panel that changes based on the active tab. Consumes TabItem children.

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading displayed above the tabs.

props.name: description
props.description: Section subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: TabItem children.

components.example:
<TabsSection title="Features">
  <TabItem label="Dashboard" title="Your Dashboard" description="See everything at a glance." image="/images/dashboard.png" />
  <TabItem label="Reports" title="Detailed Reports" description="Analyze your data." image="/images/reports.png" />
</TabsSection>

components.name: PageHero
components.description: Lightweight page hero section with centered title, optional description, badge, and children. Suitable for inner pages that do not need the full Hero with image and CTAs.

props.name: title
props.description: Page title displayed as an h1.

props.name: description
props.description: Supporting paragraph text below the title.

props.name: badge
props.description: Small badge text displayed above the title.

props.name: children
props.description: Additional content rendered below the description.

components.example:
<PageHero
  title="About Us"
  description="Learn more about our mission and team."
  badge="Company"
/>

components.name: BlogArticle
components.description: Top-level wrapper for blog article content. Renders a centered, max-width article container with vertical padding.

props.name: children
props.description: Article content (headings, paragraphs, blog components).

props.name: contentFolder
props.description: Content folder identifier for the blog article.

components.example:
<BlogArticle>
  ## Section heading
  Content here...
</BlogArticle>

components.name: BlogIndex
components.description: Blog listing page wrapper with an optional title, description, and children for rendering blog post cards or custom content.

props.name: title
props.description: Page heading displayed above the blog list.

props.name: description
props.description: Page subheading text.

props.name: children
props.description: Blog post cards or other content.

components.example:
<BlogIndex title="Blog" description="Latest articles and insights.">
  {/* Blog post cards rendered here */}
</BlogIndex>

components.name: ContentSection
components.description: Titled section with prose-style formatting for paragraphs and lists. Used as a child of ContentPage for structured text pages (legal, about, FAQ, etc.).

props.name: title
props.description: Section heading (e.g. '1. Data Collection', 'Our Mission').

props.name: children
props.description: Section content (paragraphs, lists, etc.).

components.example:
<ContentSection title="Our Mission">
  We build tools that help developers ship faster.
</ContentSection>

components.name: ContentPage
components.description: Top-level wrapper for text-heavy pages (legal, about, contact, etc.). Renders a narrow, centered container with a title and optional last-updated date.

props.name: title
props.description: Page title displayed as an h1.

props.name: lastUpdated
props.description: Date string displayed below the title (e.g. '2024-01-15').

props.name: children
props.description: ContentSection children and other content.

components.example:
<ContentPage title="About Us">
  <ContentSection title="Our Mission">
    We build tools that help developers ship faster.
  </ContentSection>
</ContentPage>
